traits.name: Death Throes
entries: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its scales and flesh immediately shrivel away, and then its bones explode. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage.

traits.name: Glide
entries: When the draconian falls and isn't {@condition incapacitated}, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The draconian makes two Trident melee attacks or two Lightning Discharge attacks.

actions.name: Trident
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Lightning Discharge
entries: Ranged Spell atk +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 10 (3d6 damage) lightning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):
